channel.title: CVE Feed for Go standard library -- encoding/gob
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Go standard library -- encoding/gob

item.title: CVE-2022-30635|2024-08-03T06:56:13.235Z -- go%20standard%20library -- encoding%2Fgob
item.description: Uncontrolled recursion in Decoder.Decode in encoding/gob before Go 1.17.12 and Go 1.18.4 allows an attacker to cause a panic due to stack exhaustion via a message which contains deeply nested structures.
